actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the standing rules of the Senate regarding application for a Constitutional Convention.

summary.text: Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that applications received in the Senate by States requesting a convention to amend the Constitution, be printed in their entirety in the Congressional Record. Directs the Committee on the Judiciary to print a list of such applications in the Record biannually, including the total number of applications received on a given subject matter.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the standing rules of the Senate regarding application for a Constitutional Convention.
